article: There is a park near my home. But I don't go there very often. One afternoon I went into  the park  and found it was really small. In the park, there were two different ways. One way was wide and clean. There were  lots of  flowers on both sides.  The other  way was narrow and dirty. Wild grass grew everywhere. But finally I decided to follow the dirty way. Ah! There was a small  _  there. It was the most beautiful garden I had ever seen. There were lots of trees, flowers and chairs. I thought it was  the best  part in the park. Many people  _  me that there was nothing to see in the park. Now I tell them  _  they follow the right way, they can feel the difference. When I'm telling them,  _  just smile at me without answering. I know they don't believe me. My trip to the park that day made me understand something about  _  . Don't be  _  to choose a different way. Be brave . You may get a big surprise!
